page.title: 06Education.
page.content: There is no secondary sshool in our block,however there are two small primary schools.One is a Couty Primary and the other a Voluntary Controlled. Both are two teacher schools with around 40 pupils each. One kitchen supplies meals to both shools,this employs a cook and a kitchen assistant.Around 80% of the pupils buy school lunches,which cost 60p per day. All children in the county are taught in Welsh and English,and playground games are played in both languages. There are no nursery schools in the block but there is a mother and toddler group. Secondary children are taken by bus to either Carmarthen or St Clears,they have the option of English or Welsh first language education.
